page.title: 20DOMESDAY PROJECT TEAM.
page.content:
{ Eleven children, the entire school {roll, aged from five to eleven}were responsible for making this study.They have observed at first hand about 90% of the land cover, the remaining portions being beyond physical access, and therefore calculated from maps and from third parties. We are grateful to the people who gave us time to demonstrate their skills.Assistance from the many people both known and unknown to us who have completed our questionnaires.Those who offered refreshment on our travels, gave us parking space and the whole community who encouraged us in our study.
Allan Sharon David Diane Jonathan Andrew Jamie Louise Cheryl Sarah and James. {______________________________________
